# GCVirtualController.Configuration

**Class**

The configuration of a virtual controller.

## Declaration

```swift
class Configuration
```

## Overview

You configure a virtual controller by specifying the input elements it contains. Then using the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCVirtualController/updateConfiguration(forElement:configuration:)] method, you can customize individual elements.

## Setting the elements

- **elements**: The input elements of a virtual controller.

## Presenting a custom interface

- **isHidden**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system or the app presents the virtual interface.

## Creating virtual controllers

- **init(configuration:)**: Creates a new virtual controller using the configuration you specify.

## Inherits From

- NSObject
